title: Trump says he is instructing 'representatives' to buy $200 billion in mortgage bond purchases in an effort to push down rates
full_text:
Trump says he is instructing 'representatives' to buy $200 billion in mortgage bond purchases in an effort to push down rates. Trump said Thursday that he is instructing "representatives" to buy $200 billion in mortgage bonds, aiming to lower interest rates and monthly payments.. Evelyn Hockstein/Reuters
  • President Donald Trump proposes $200 billion in mortgage bond purchases to lower housing costs.
  • Trump claims Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac have funds to support… [+1286 chars]
